author: don't act like you don't know my name

review: So far so good. The initial set up went fairly well . I did have a few talk to myself moments  . The first being that my TV did not recognize the Fire Stick . I had to go into the TV sets programing and set up the HDMI port to recognize  Fire Stick. After that the programing went fairly well.I did have to input my wireless modem password. I've only watched one movie so far with no issues. I've been checking out all the programming available  and adding some to my watch list. Looks like a good amount to choose from.
author: Amazon Customer "Skip"

review: Better than the Roku stick. Not better than the Roku 3. But that's not a fair fight. I like the chromecast... However having a dedicated remote is nice. So in the end, for a cheapish media player/bridge... This thing works well.At the 19 I paid I would order a few more. At 40... I have to mull it over.
author: Kris Hamilton

review: Wont connect to the internet for more than 15 seconds at a time
author: Janice M. Parro

review: Easy setup. Ideal for an Amazon Prime member
author: sure2rain

review: Easy to install. Great item Thank you Amazon.
author: Ben Ouziel

review: This is a very awesome product. We had a chromecast, the fire beats it, hands down!
author: Dan L. Wilson "Danno"

review: It is only worth 20 dollars which is what I paid thank god.
author: sydney king

review: Used Chromcast for a year, Fire TV stick is superior, although I haven't found the volume control yet. I was disappointed in the Chromecast because I was working out of town for several months, and the hotel network would not let my phone talk to the Chromecast. I hope the Fire TV stick doesn't have the same issue between the stick and the remote..
author: Tjscali "Student"
